source:
plt.hist(df['date_diff'], bins=35, range=(0,35), align='left')
plt.title('Histogram of Landsat8 Revisit Periods')
plt.xlabel('Days')
plt.ylabel('Frequency')
plt.xticks(range(0, 36, 2))
plt.savefig('revisit_histogram.png')
plt.show()

plt.scatter(df['Date'], df['date_diff'])
plt.title('Time Series of Landsat8 Revisit Periods')
plt.xlabel('Date')
plt.ylabel('Days')
# plt.xticks(rotation=45)
plt.savefig('revisit_timeseries.png')
plt.show()
